jira_mcp_docker_args_format.overview:
Docker/Podman args array MUST include -e flags to pass environment variables into containers.
CRITICAL: -e flag syntax is IDENTICAL for both Docker and Podman.
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md - "Docker/Podman Args Format" section - "Correct Format (Docker)" and "Correct Format (Podman)" sections - "Common Mistakes" section
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.critical_requirement:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md (Critical Requirement section)
Environment variables in "env" section are NOT automatically available inside containers. MUST explicitly pass using -e flags in args array.
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.correct_syntax:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md (Correct Format sections)
Key rules: - Each -e flag followed by ONLY variable NAME (not value) - Container runtime looks up value from "env" section - Format: "-e", "VARIABLE_NAME" (two separate array elements)
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.required_e_flags:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md (Required Environment Variables section)
All 6 required flags: - CONFLUENCE_URL, CONFLUENCE_USERNAME, CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN - JIRA_URL, JIRA_USERNAME, JIRA_API_TOKEN
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.common_mistakes:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md (Common Mistakes section)
- Missing all -e flags - Using -e "VAR=VALUE" syntax - Placing -e flags after container image
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.mode_behavior: When creating/updating .roo/mcp.json or .mcp.json: 1. Follow format from shared pattern (Docker/Podman Args Format section) 2. Use correct -e flag syntax (variable NAME only, not value) 3. Include all 6 required -e flags BEFORE container image 4. Validate using commands from shared pattern (Validation Steps section)
jira_mcp_docker_args_format.validation:
Defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-mcp-troubleshooting.md (Validation Steps section)
- Count -e flags: grep -o '"-e"' [config-file] | wc -l (expect: 6) - Verify no VAR=VALUE syntax - Verify all -e flags before container image - Verify env section has all 6 variables with values
